attributes.action: Let Arnel Cabrera stay in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Arnel's wife was unlawfully killed in a tragic case of malpractice in the UK's medical System. He has now been told he must leave the UK as his wife no longer works in the country.

This man has lost his wife, had to raise his son as a widower and now is to be deported. We as a country need to support him and his son and provide them the help and compassion they need.

Help Arnel!!

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
